speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Hah! Looks like someone else appreciates your taste, too. Ain’t that a great feeling?

speaker: Alma
dialogue: You know, I seem to remember a younger Captain who had a penchant for making very terrible nautical puns…

speaker: Cap’n Cutout
dialogue: Errrm, I have no idea what yer talking about, Alma! Ehehehe…

speaker: Alma
dialogue: I was the first person who laughed at his puns. I still think they’re charming.

speaker: Alma
dialogue: Well, what are you waiting for? Write [her/him/them] a card back!
